# Binary

##### dumpbin.sh

バイナリのhexをCの配列に格納するコードを出力

```
./dumpbin.sh arrayname < a.out > outout.txt
```
```
const unsigned char arrayname[] = {
 0x7f,0x45,0x4c,0x46,0x02,0x01,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0x02,0x00,0x3e,0x00,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0xf0,0x03,0x40,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0x40,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x88,0x12,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x38,0x00,0x08,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x1f,0x00,0x1c,0x00,
 0x06,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x05,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0x40,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0xc0,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0xc0,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0x08,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x03,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x04,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 0x00,0x02,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x02,0x40,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
 ...
```
